amendment.description: To prohibit the slaughter of dogs and cats for human consumption.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3390 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3390 proposed by Senator Roberts for Senator Gillibrand to Amendment SA 3224. (consideration: CR S4713-4714; text: CR S4714) To prohibit the slaughter of dogs and cats for human consumption.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3390 proposed by Senator Roberts for Senator Gillibrand to Amendment SA 3224.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3390 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
